review_blob: Great old school American beer made with the original recipe.  Good sweet and lightly sour flavor.
Tastes like your sucking on a tea bag.  I think I overdosed on hops.  Not subtle at all.

pale, medium sweetness, medium bitterness, lightly sour, medium body, thin feel, soft carbonation, bitter, likable European style beer.  Has a softer taste than a German pilsner.  Goes well with spicy Italian food.
A truly great American hefe.  Lighter than its German counterparts but thats not necessarily an automatic bad thing.  Citrus aroma, slightly murky, very tasty.
Great Summer beer.  Big foamy head and cloudy appearance.  One of the smoothest hefeweizens Ive ever had.  Sweet but not sharp.  A thoroughly enjoyable adult beverage.
